experiences.description:
**Enterprise Technology & Performance (ETP) - Systems Engineering** 
• Full stack developer developed mobile and web applications for the eCommerce platform using VueJS, NodeJS, Java.
• Constructed API endpoints in the application using AWS services for communication with other resources.
• Led a team in diagnosing and resolving technical issues, fostered knowledge exchange, and effectively fixed bugs.
• Managed change requests for the project and coordinated with stakeholders to ensure successful implementation.
• Created comprehensive project documentation for future reference and helped optimize issue resolution processes.

**Artificial Intelligence & Data (AI&D) - Operation Team**
• Performed thorough checks on the Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW) to identify the discrepancies between dashboard numbers and actual business reports.
• Facilitated sessions with clients to present findings, address problems, and offer guidance on subsequent steps.
• Supported in EDW Disaster Recovery Server Setup preparation, such as planning activities and backup files & folders.
• Assisted with AWS Cloud migration assessment via executive interviews and workshops to recommend the client's digital strategy.
